docs.title: Generic Python Tools & Utilities
docs.text: A collection of python utilities, without hard dependencies

docs.title: Development installation
docs.text:
Setup the development environment:

git clone git@github.com:lucmos/toolpy.git
cd toolpy
conda env create -f env.yaml
conda activate toolpy
pre-commit install

Run the tests:

pre-commit run --all-files
pytest -v

docs.title: Update the dependencies
docs.text:
Re-install the project in edit mode:

pip install -e .[dev]
